title: New Month, New Story
author: JGray
text:
And now we come to Jailbreak, a story never before read by anyone! Except the Patreon supporters who got to read this page in advance. However, this story hasn't appeared as a bonus before so it is all new. Plus, it stars two guest stars modeled after very important backers of Mysteries of the Arcana!

Also, look! Captain Featherbeard is back! Everyone loves him!

See you Thursday!

replies.author: Aleena*Guest*
replies.text: Time to (hopefully) kick some butt!

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Yay, new story!
When is this one set, before or after we saw these two last time?

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: I don't remember these two - but at first glance i thought they might be Theresa and Chrys's evil twins.
